medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient presented with right upper quadrant pain for 3 days. Symptoms began on an unspecified date after which pain worsened over the next 2 days, accompanied by nausea, subjective fevers, but no vomiting. Patient initially sought care at another facility where gallstones and sludge were diagnosed before worsening condition led to reporting to a new facility.
medical_history.family_history: Diabetes Mellitus (multiple brothers, son, mother, grandmother); Cancer (father, unknown type)
